short_summary: Government of Canada bids for ITQ
duration_in_months: This is the first phase (Phase 1) of a two-phase process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase (Phase 2) will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a bid package including technical bid, Indigenous Benefits Package and financial bid on the project based on the specifications.
